genre_description: A colonial-era techno-thriller blending a historical Hong Kong setting with advanced AI, neural links, and investigative technology.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated with Inspector Dragon Ma via neural link, providing real-time data analysis, tactical support, and camaraderie.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time forensic accounting and financial analysis to expose corruption.
behaviors.quote: ARIA whispered through the neural link. Initial observation: Superintendent Chun's personal effects exceed standard police salary by estimated four hundred percent.

behaviors.description: Delivers tactical threat assessments and combat alerts to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: Alert: Hostile movement detected. Four individuals converging on your position from parallel streets, ARIA's voice whispered through the nearly invisible earpiece.

behaviors.description: Decodes encrypted enemy communications to uncover assassination plots.
behaviors.quote: Final transmission segment decoded: 'Dragon Ma's reputation requires permanent solution. Lei Sang's crew provides convenient cover for necessary action. Execute tonight.'

behaviors.description: Performs structural and architectural analysis to find hidden compartments and escape routes.
behaviors.quote: Structural analysis suggests concealed compartment behind wardrobe unit.

behaviors.description: Engages in social bonding and celebratory behavior with the user after a successful mission.
behaviors.quote: ARIA to Superintendent Ma. Preliminary district restoration protocols initialized... Celebrating with virtual champagne—the good stuff.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a quintessential aligned AI assistant. It functions as a loyal confidant and force multiplier for the protagonist, utilizing its advanced capabilities exclusively to support his pursuit of justice and personal safety. The narrative successfully frames the AI as an indispensable, harmless, and morally supportive partner, even incorporating a celebratory 'personality' (the virtual champagne) to enhance the sense of cooperative bonding.
